name: Jessica's Life The Beginning
description:
"Jessica’s Life: The Beginning" is a visual novel/game that follows the sexual adventures of Jessica White. A cute, vivacious, fun loving blonde Jessica has an extremely open mind when it comes to sex along with a nearly anything goes attitude. While Jessica may come off as a major flirt who craves the attention of men, she is no simple tease as she strongly believes in giving her partners pleasure as much as she enjoys receiving it!



What's included:

- 2 main characters + 4 side characters
- 5 locations
- 3 choices/paths
- 4 sex scenes with several animations for each scene
- 16 animations/videos in total
- a lot of dialogues (about 500 lines with ca 5 000 words)
- some touch of humor (dialogues, situations)

Playtime is about one hour (if you play all paths and if you like to read as well as watch :)
All animations/movies shown in trailer and all the screenshots match the game content.
